Header.title: Your best guide to sustainable home gardening
Header.paragraph: Join a community of passionate gardeners, enhance your gardening skills, and contribute to sustainable development.

About.paragraph: As of 2021, the carbon emission rate has reached the second highest rate in history. The environmental problem is becoming more serious since the world is creating more emission while trying to recover from the pandamic. At the same time, there are about 25% of US households are interested in gardenings but many of them have no ideas on how to start.
Why: The Carbonet provides a solution for gardeners to track progress of their plants and find their community. Gardeners can find intructions on taking care of their plants and share their gardens with their friends. Whether you want to get some tips kicking start your home garden or find garderners who share the same passion, Carbonet is here to help. Ultimately, we believe by bringing in the contribution from each gardener, we can create significant impact on protecting our planet Earth,

Services.name: Track and Interpret
Services.text: Users can track and understand their carbon footprint

Services.name: Learn
Services.text: Users can learn about carbon footprint and how it relates to home gardening

Services.name: Connect
Services.text: Users can communicate and connect with people of shared interests

Features.title: Guide Your Experience
Features.text: Search for your plants and interact with other gardening enthusiasts

Features.title: Track Your Progress
Features.text: Record and track the growth of your plants through your personalized dashboard

Features.title: Reduce Your Emissions
Features.text: Understand your personal carbon footprint reduction and contribute to global sustainability development
